page.title: 04FARMS IN THE AREA
page.content: At Calf Heath pigs and chickens are bred by intensive farming methods.The poultry are reared for eggs which are sold both at market and the farm shop, the pigs are sent for slaughter elsewhere.The Hollies Farm at Laney Green is a food production unit,rearing one day old chicks to full grown birds. These are killed and dressed on the premises then sold to butchers, restaurants and the general public. Manor House Farm at the Laches is a 70 acre fruit farm,growing soft fruit and vegetables.Most fruit is sold on a "pick your own" basis but some pickers are hired and the fruit sold from the farm shop or to jam manufacturers.At the nearby garden centre several acres of land are planted with trees,shrubs, bedding plants and roses for sale to the public.
